actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to provide for waiver of the requirement that proof of actual use be furnished within three years after the date an article is entered, and for reliquidation of certain entries of tubular tin products.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to reliquidate, as duty-free, four specified entries covering tubular tin products, if a certificate of actual use for the products is submitted to the U.S. Customs Service at the port of entry within 120 days of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for waiver of the requirement that proof of actual use be furnished within three years after the date an article is entered, and for reliquidation of certain entries of tubular tin products.
